data.author: Raingna

changelog.release_notes:
Fixed some issues with configuration, again.
Fixed Lime colored squid being too shy to show up.
Fixed issues loading and saving preferences.

Fixed settings screen. Thanks everyone for all the bug reports!

(New settings screen might crash sometimes on original Pebble. I'd appreciate any reports about this from original Pebble users)

-Added support for the original (Black and White) Pebble and Pebble Steel.
-Added Grey squid color.

-Updated watchface icon.
-Made Lime squid be green instead of actually Yellow.
-Added three new squid colors: Red, Yellow and Violet.

First release.

-6 squid colors to choose from.
-Optional vibration on Bluetooth connection/disconnection.
-Pebble battery level indicator.
-Comfigurable date display.

data.description:
You're a kid now! Your watch is a squid now! Ink your wrist with this Splatoon-themed watchface!

Features 10 selectable squid colors, bluetooth connection icon (with optional vibration on connection and disconnection), and battery level indicator.

Splatoon and Wii U are trademarks of Nintendo. Â© 2015 Nintendo. This is a non-profit fan work.

latest_release.release_notes:
Fixed some issues with configuration, again.
Fixed Lime colored squid being too shy to show up.

data.title: Splatoon Squid Watchface
